sentences.en: Don't trample mud from your shoes on to the floor; I've just this minute swept it.
sentences.cn: 不要把你鞋上的泥踩在地板上, 我刚刚才扫过地.

sentences.en: Don't trample on the flower bed.
sentences.cn: 别践踏花坛.

sentences.en: Don't trample on the flowers when you play in the garden.
sentences.cn: 在花园里玩耍时,不要踩坏花.

sentences.en: Don't trample on the grass.
sentences.cn: 勿踏草地.

sentences.en: Go further! let It'serve to trample on.
sentences.cn: 苍白,不配给你当偎依的 枕头 ./走吧! 尽把它踏在脚下,作垫石.

sentences.en: He could trample on them with ease.
sentences.cn: 他便能随心所欲地粗暴对待他们的.

sentences.en: He saw something like an attempt to trample upon the rights and independence of Scotland.
sentences.cn: 他看出了想把苏格兰的独立和权力踏在脚底下的某种企图.

sentences.en: I heard someone trample about in the hall.
sentences.cn: 我听到有人在过道里噔噔地走来走去.

sentences.en: Just trample on the pain, or you'll be beat down by it.
sentences.cn: 要麽你被痛苦击倒,要麽你把痛苦踩在脚下.

sentences.en: Many people were trampled in the panic that followed.
sentences.cn: 很多人在随后的恐慌中被踩伤。

sentences.en: Please don't trample on the azaleas.
sentences.cn: 请勿踩踏杜鹃花。

sentences.en: Take care not to trample down the flowers.
sentences.cn: 当心不要把花踩坏.

sentences.en: Their feet will trample on the dead bodies of their perfidious aggressors.
sentences.cn: 他们将从背信弃义的侵略者的尸体上踏过。

sentences.en: Their in-terests and rights had been trampled underfoot .
sentences.cn: 他们的利益和权利都被踩在了脚下。

sentences.en: There was a small fence to stop people trampling on the flowers.
sentences.cn: 有一道小小的围栏，防止人们践踏花草。

sentences.en: They say loggers are destroying rain forests and trampling on the rights of natives.
sentences.cn: 他们说伐木工正在破坏雨林，无视当地人的权利。

sentences.en: Trample ( Ex ): Reflex DC 37 half.
sentences.cn: 碾压Trample ( Ex ): 反射DC37伤害减半.

sentences.en: Trample ( Ex ): Reflex DC 37 half. The save DC is Strength - based.
sentences.cn: 碾压Trample ( Ex ): 反射DC37伤害减半. 豁免 DC 基于力量.

sentences.en: We heard the trample of many feet.
sentences.cn: 我们听到许多人的沉重脚步声.

sentences.en: When America is under stress, as is happening right now with debates about where to pare the budget, we sometimes trample the least powerful and most vulnerable among us.
sentences.cn: 当美国正在承受压力，正如当下争论的——在哪些方面削减预算，我们有时会蹂躏那些我们中间力量最弱小、最脆弱的群体。

words.tran_cn: 践踏；蔑视，伤害；脚步沉重地走

trans.tran_en: to step heavily on something, so that you crush it with your feet

trans.tran_cn: 践踏，重重地踩，脚步沉重地走
践踏，蹂躏，无视，蔑视，侵犯，伤害
